translation.logoutConfirmation: Are You Sure You Want To Log Out?
translation.createNotion: This account entitles you to access this application content, and is not to open a trading account with DirectTT.
translation.confirmMessage: We sent a confirmation email to:
translation.confirmCheck: Check your email and click on the confirmation link to continue.
translation.thankYouMessage: The Direct TT app's content is customized to your location. Please turn on Location Services on your device.
translation.tradingAccount: Do you have a trading account With Direct TT?
translation.partnershipInterested: Are you interested in Direct TT partnership program?
translation.beginnerTxt: Select this menu if you're new to trading and want to learn more about it and financial markets with our free educational courses and develop your skills with a Direct TT demo account before opening a real one.
translation.experiencedTxt: Select this menu if you're an old experienced trader looking forward to learn more about our exceptional end-to-end offerings that provide more than 30,000 traders the ultimate trading experience.
translation.partnerTxt: Select this menu if you're only interested in learning more about our lucrative partnership and rewards programs. Partner today with Direct TT and start earning immediately.
translation.managedTxt: Select this menu if you're only interested in learning more about our lucrative partnership and rewards programs. Partner today with Direct TT and start earning immediately.
translation.countryCityManually: Please Enter Your Country & City Manually.
translation.emailPasswordEmpty: Email Address Or Password Cannot Be Empty.
translation.minimumPasswordAlert: Password Must Be Minimum 8 Characters Long.
translation.emailSpam: Please verify your email in order to access the app content (Make sure to check your spam inbox too).
translation.passwordValidation: Must Contain 8 Characters, One Uppercase, One Lowercase, One Number and One Special Case Character
translation.passwordConfirmSame: Both Passwords Must Be The Same
translation.passwordValidationAlert: Must Contain 8 Characters, One Uppercase, One Lowercase, One Number and One Special Case Character.
translation.passwordConfirmSameAlert: Both Passwords Must Be The Same.
translation.differentEmail: Please try a different email address to register or login to your existing account.
translation.tryAgain: Please Try This Process Again In A While.
translation.passwordSuccessfullyResetTxt: You have successfully reset your password.
translation.invalidAccessTokenTxt: An error occured trying to reset your password with the previous token. Try using another valid one.
